_sText:
Cs_cb_pursuit Beta Version 1

Hostage Rescue Map Awaiting Beta Testing

Specification:
Up To 40 Players Recommended.
Maximum Players (Spawns) 60
Hostage Rescue
Farely Simple Layout, easy to grasp and OwN!
Contains a mixture of open and closed spaces
Sniping and One on One combat is prominant
GOOD VISIBILITY, although set in the evening, the map is lit for clear viewing
Map Overview
Navigation Mesh

Future Updates:
Further Beta Version/s and Full Release
More Detail where needed
Minor adjustments to gameplay issues
Performance Tweaks


Watch This Space! for the full version and my other up and coming maps.
www.crowbird.co.uk
map forum: www.crowbird.co.uk/mapforum
